creator: Rupert S. Holland
description:
LibriVox recording of Historic Adventures: Tales from American History by Rupert S. Holland.
Read in English by Tammy Stalcup; DPranitis; Tom Merritt; Greg Giordano; Bria Snow; leetripp12; Larry Wilson

This is a collection of early American stories, interesting read. (Summary by sidhu177)

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

M4B Format Available
subject: librivox; audiobooks;children; history; travel; American history; children's history; american tales
